mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.article_id AS articleId, c.user_id AS userId, c.content, c.create_time AS createTime, c.parent_id AS parentId, u.username AS commenterName, u.avatar AS commenterAvatar FROM article_comment c LEFT JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.article_id = #{articleId} ORDER BY c.create_time DESC
